mapper.sql: open_id, user_id, union_id, nickname, sex, country, province, city, language, avatar, create_time, update_time, subscrib_status, ext, ext1, ext2
mapper.select: select wx.avatar FROM wx_user_info wx LEFT JOIN user_interest us ON wx.user_id = us.user_id where entity_id = #{entityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and type = #{type, jdbcType=TINYINT} and us.status = 0
mapper.insert: insert into wx_user_info (open_id, user_id, union_id, nickname, sex, country, province, city, language, avatar, create_time, update_time, subscrib_status, ext, ext1, ext2) values (#{openId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subscribStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ext2,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
